text: VeraLinn Jamieson (born 1960) is an American lieutenant general in the United States Air Force. She serves as the Deputy Chief of Staff for Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance, a position she has held since 2016.https://www.military.com/daily-news/2017/02/28/air-forces-new- intelligence-chief-explains-vision-for-future- isr.htmlhttps://www.af.mil/About- Us/Biographies/Display/Article/108431/lieutenant-general-veralinn-dash- jamieson/ ==References== == External links == Category:Living people Category:Female generals of the United States Air Force Category:1960 births
title: VeraLinn Jamieson
